short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a browser action icon to the toolbar to take control of deezer tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon let you take control of the deezer tab wherever you are in Firefox.

Buttons displayed are I hope quite obvious. The pink one is to display the current playlist.

You can switch on or off keyboard shortcuts by clicking the red cross / the green tick.

Shortcuts are :
Ctrl+Up : play.
Ctrl+Down: pause.
Ctrl+Left: previous track.
Ctrl+Right : next track.

Hope you'll enjoy it and find it usefull. Any ideas, reviews and bug tracking is welcomed.

If you'd like to participate : paypal account : paiement@chowbi.net
